Whether you're sending an email, or tagging me on GitHub, please use this as a guideline for determining when to contact me. You can find my contact info [instructor](#instruct) section.

## Have an question about how to code something?

Post an issue to the class [Discussion repo](https://github.com/USF-Psych-DataSci-2020/Discussion/issues). Your classmates will likely be able to help you diagnose and solve your issue. 

## Have an issue with the way you were evaluated?

I will have left an Issue on your homework repo. Continue the conversation there.

## Have an issue that should be discussed in private? 

Send me an email directly.
